RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 92. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 13 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNAWAY HARRY broke alertly, set all the pace and drew off through the stretch under mild left handed urging to win as much the best. GRAN ANDREWS stalked the pace three wide under a firm hold, offered a mild bid on the far turn then was no match for the winner while well clear for second. ZERO GRAVITY never far back, improved position four wide on the far turn then three wide in deep stretch. MASTER OF WAR trailed around the clubhouse turn, offered a mild bid along the inside before a half then came up empty. VENETIAN DREAM pressured the winner two wide into the far turn then gave way in the stretch. PRIVATE LAKE was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Runaway Harry
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Andrews
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, middle move, 3 wide, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUFFICE chased the leader down the backstretch, made the lead two wide entering the turn, set the balance of the pace and widened at will through the stretch under mild right handed urging to win as much the best. SHEWEARSMYRING bobbled at the start, stalked the pace through the turn, had a mild late rally in the five path and got up for second in the final strides. AMENSET offered a mild bid in the four path while three wide through the turn and was outfinished for second. DREAM GIVER had brief speed outside. SKI SLOPE away alertly, set the pace along the inside down the backstretch, had speed into the stretch then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Ski Slope
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace backstretch, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Suffice
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, took over 2 wide near 3/8pole, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Amenset
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, 4path turn, outfinished for second

ENTRY.NAME: Shewearsmyring
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, stalked pace, mild rally late 5path, up place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILLIAMSBEACHBABE stalked the pace along the rail into the stretch, responded under right handed urging to make the lead past the furlong marker and finished full of run to win going away. YOU NAME IT dueled for the lead inside rivals and finished second best in the three path. TRULY INCLUSIVE stalked the pace two then four wide into the stretch and was outfinished. BODE'S ROSE contested the lead two wide into the stretch and weakened late. TWENTY FOUR KARAT moved up four wide through the turn then came up empty. ARTIES CRYPTONITE trailed into the stretch, swung wide and passed tiring rivals in the seven path. C MORE PRIDE had brief speed four wide. SWEET OUTLOOK was outrun. HOSANNA was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Williamsbeachbabe
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked rail, got through upper stretch, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Bode's Rose
ENTRY.OWNER: Pocket Aces Racing LLC and Susan Anderson Racing LLC

ENTRY.NAME: C More Pride
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 14300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TATTERED HEART never far back, drew on near even terms three wide nearing the quarter pole, dug in late under right handed urging and got up in the final strides. DULCE VICTORIA pressed the pace three wide into the turn, made the lead, set the balance of the pace along the inside and just missed hanging on. LORI'S EYES set a pressured pace along the inside into the turn, had her heels clipped nearing the quarter pole, shifted two wide in upper stretch then was outfinished. POLITICAL ASTRAY failed to menace. MOON PARTY had good early speed four wide and was through after a half. FALL CAMPAIGN vied for the lead along the inside into the turn, clipped heels nearing the quarter pole, fell and was walked of. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Fall Campaign
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, clipped heels near 1/4pole, fell, walked of

ENTRY.NAME: Lori's Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured inside, heels clipped near 1/4 pole, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, 4 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Tattered Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, long drive, 3 wide, up in final strides,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SKY stalked the pace into the turn, rallied three wide into the stretch, was put to right handed urging, made the lead nearing the furlong marker and drew clear late under a strong hand ride. HIGH CUPPER trailed three wide down the backstretch, dropped inside on the turn, rallied along the rail through the stretch and finished clear for second. MORE MUCHO pressed the pace two wide into the turn, had speed into the stretch then faded. POLISHED GEM away alertly, set the pace along the inside into the stretch, drifted to the three path and weakened late. EGG NOG failed to menace. LA REINA DEL NORTE stalked the early pace three wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Polished Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, rallied 3 wide turn, took over near 1/8p, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: La Reina Del Norte
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: High Cupper
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, angled in turn, rallied rail, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pref erred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ASKIN FOR A BASKIN sprinted to the lead before a quarter, set a pressured pace into the stretch, drifted to the four path, was headed by the runner up late and fought back gamely three wide to get back up in time. MAKING ME CRAZY never far back, rallied along the inside through the turn and into the stretch, gained a narrow advantage late inside the winner but was denied. MALIBU CLASSIC unhurried early, finished with good courage along the rail to be clear for third. FRONTLINER failed to menace. CHIC N WILBUR with the second flight inside, drifted out on the turn then faded late. SKIDSTREAM well placed, failed to respond. RHYTHMIC RULER pressed the early pace two wide and was through after a half. LONG RAP SHEET stalked the pace three wide through the bend then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Askin for a Baskin
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, drifted 4path top lane, headed, fought back

ENTRY.NAME: Chic N Wilbur
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight inside, drifted out turn, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Skidstream
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Making Me Crazy
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied inside, led late, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Rhythmic Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 77. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 13 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIVINE MARTHA sprinted up the inside to gain a narrow lead before a quarter, set a pressured pace into the stretch then drew off late under a strong hand ride. SPECIAL BEACH with the second flight offered a mild bid three wide into the stretch and finished clear for second. FOR THE BISCUIT bobbled at the start, pressed the early pace two wide, dropped inside on the turn then went evenly. TEAM GOLD DIGGER trailed early, swung wide and passed tiring rivals in the seven path. CALENDULA had brief speed inside. ANNMARIA failed to menace. GRANADICA offered a mild bid five wide into the stretch then came up empty. AMAAZA pressured the winner two wide into the stretch then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Team Gold Digger
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, passed tiring rivals 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Martha
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace inside, drew clear, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: For the Biscuit
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, pressed pace 2 wide, dropped inside turn, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Amaaza
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, upper stretch, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Special Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, middle move, 3 wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 37. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANZANITEAWAY chased the pace into the turn, engaged the front runner midway on the bend, matched strides two wide the balance of the trip and proved best in a stiff drive under right handed urging. OH GLORIOUS DAY sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set the pace until deep stretch, dug in gamely but couldn't handle the winner. HISTORYINTHEMAKING well placed, went evenly in the five path through the stretch. PITY PURCHASE failed to menace. NANCYFROMTHEBLOCK was no factor. LUCKY STUFF stumbled badly at the start and failed to reach contention. SOMETHING LUCKY raced a wide trip and was never involved. THIRTY SOMETHING stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch then gave way readily. COWGIRLS HUMOR was outrun. LATE BLOOMBOPPER was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Oh Glorious Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace, dug in gamely, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Late Bloombopper
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W

ENTRY.NAME: Danzaniteaway
ENTRY.OWNER: Barker Scott W and Barker Carol
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, engaged turn, long drive 2 wide, proved best
